main event: A bright, rapidly moving object was reported by personnel at the Kokomo Airport Control Tower on May 7, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed moving in an erratic manner over a period of approximately 10 minutes., It was described as a bright light with no sound accompanying it., The object was observed at a high altitude., It disappeared from view in the northeasterly direction., Witnesses reported the object was seen from the airport control tower.
witness description: personnel at the Kokomo Airport Control Tower
